content.en: Mesh algorithm efficiency: Algorithms are being used to solve various problems on reconfigurable meshes, such as the angle-restricted all nearest neighbor problem, computational geometry problems, visibility problems, tree problems, convexity problems, triangulation, the Hough transform, the convex hull of sorted points, constrained triangulations, the contour of maximal elements, channel-assignment, image processing tasks, Euclidean minimum spanning trees, optimal algorithms for constrained reconfigurable meshes, the Radon and Hough transforms, dynamic programming problems on directed reconfigurable networks, and the Euclidean distance transform. These algorithms aim to provide efficient and constant-time solutions for these problems on reconfigurable meshes.
content.da: Effektivitet af mesh-algoritmer: Algoritmer bruges til at løse forskellige problemer på rekonfigurerbare meshes, såsom det vinkelbegrænsede nærmeste nabo-problem, problemer inden for beregningsgeometri, synlighedsproblemer, træproblemer, konveksitetsproblemer, triangulering, Hough-transformationen, det konvekse hylster af sorterede punkter, begrænsede trianguleringer, konturen af maksimale elementer, kanaltildelingsopgaver, billedbehandling, Euklidiske minimumstængselstræer, optimale algoritmer til begrænsede rekonfigurerbare meshes, Radon- og Hough-transformationer, dynamisk programmering på dirigerede rekonfigurerbare netværk og den Euklidiske afstandstransformation. Disse algoritmer har til formål at levere effektive og konstant-tids løsninger til disse problemer på rekonfigurerbare meshes.
